questions.question: In a 2D gel where each spot represents a protein of a particular pI value and molecular weight, what will be your inference about two proteins whose positions are horizontal to each other in the gel?:

answers.a: They have same molecular weight but different pI value.
answers.b: They have same pI value but different molecular weight.
answers.c: They have same pI value and same molecular weight.
answers.d: They have different pI values and different molecular weight.

questions.question: If you perform electrophoresis of histones and myoglobins having pI 8.5 and 5.5 respectively, under denaturing conditions at pH 7.0, what will be the migration pattern of these proteins? :

answers.a: histones will migrate towards the cathode (-); myoglobin will migrate towards the anode (+)
answers.b: myoglobins will migrate towards the cathode (-); histones will migrate towards the anode (+)
answers.c: both will migrate towards the cathode
answers.d: both will migrate towards the anode
